TopicTitle: is there a tutorial for importing custom made flags?

Articles.Content: I'm back to Kerbal after being away for a few years and I want to start a career with my own flag imported from jpg if that's possible.

Google: KSP flags

1st result  https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tutorial:Create_custom_flags!

2nd result https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Flag_(Image)
